language.entry: Was I not diligent enough in the ministry?
I don't want to die like this!
Are you evil servants, trying to kill me?
Want to get my silver armor? Well, try it.
I hear what you are whispering about!
I will accept the prepared for me!
Such is the will of God!
Cripples are fighting better than you!
I am serving the God, so obey me!
Protect me, it is pleasing to God!
My life is more valuable than your own!
You can't be relied upon, pathetic pagans!
I need to consult a gardener!
Do you want me to bake you a cake? Fine!
I see the target. Ready to shoot!
Lets finish with them, I'm hungry!
Are they looking for troubles? I'm here!
My deeds are pleasing to God!
I've achieved feats that no man could even dream of!
Like a walk in the park!
And you call this a monster?
It doesn't seem that you are fighting for real!
Were you ever taught to keep a weapon?
Now I must guard the crowd of fools! Fine!
Where is my helmet! I lost my helmet!
Can you be quiet? We have a tea party!
Sorry, but I'm in a hurry!
What is there? I don't see!
You have something on your back!
Maybe at least you have time to escape!
Ugh, I just do it by myself!
I do not see the point.
Everything is already a foregone conclusion!
Do you see me? But you can't!
We wasting time! Need to retreat!
You should run away and call a REAL fighters.
Do not even try to do your blasphemous rites.
I need to rest, guard me.
I deserve most of the trophies.
As God allowed it to happen?
I gathered dead rats around here! Delicious!
Have you decided to leave me?
I am too tired to run!
Wait! I want to play with friends!
We have not yet had tea!
You brought me up to this, traitor.
I been waiting this for whole year!
Oh really! Did you hit them?
It'd be best if we fled now!
Maybe enough of this silly pretense?
You're not very clever, are you?
You thought he would die of laughter?
How such idiot is still alive?
Let me to catch breath first!
Just leave me as I am!
Why do I need a crab shell?
I don't need anything from you!
Do you think you're the smartest?
It is better to let the tincture of flies!
Thanks, but I already saw this basket!
I do not understand this music!
It is not suitable for fish!
After all, I'm just a murderer, even in the hands of God.
It's time to prepare the bags for trophies!
Our names will go down in legends!
Don't fidget, I know what I'm doing.
You'll be as good as new!
I saved some wine for you.
Come closer, I'll give you the amulet!
It's getting dark in my eyes.
And get stabbed in the back?
Time to pray at last time.
Who is speaking? Is anybody here?
I need to clean my boots!
Want me to tell the fairy tale?
Don't make me take the knife...
The moon today is in wrong phase.
The suffering of hunger will clear me!
Thanks, but I want blackberry soup!
Attracted by strange rumours, the Temple sent one of it's followers to investigate the situation.
I'm sorry... Although no, I'm not sorry.
Crossbow - check! Bolts - check! Water - check! Dagger - check! Body Bag - check!
...rule 23: Always check whether the enemy is dead.
...rule 17: The crossbow must always be loaded.
I'll clean the wounds with silver.
Can I stop it's suffering? Forever.

The Arbalest of the Silver Temple sends the undead back to hell. His shots are capable of piercing heavy armor and potions dissolve enemies alive.His shining armor is clearly visible in the darkest dungeon, but he is ready to accept the battle and illuminate the gathering darkness.
Arbalest destroys enemies at a distance thanks to his crossbow. If necessary, he can take close combat, relying on his silver-plated armor.

Arbalest is making deadly shots and pierce the armor of enemies. The equipment of the Temple allows him to dissolve his opponents and dispel the darkness. Melee skills help to punish opponents who have come too close.
Слуги зла, вы собрались погубить меня?
Вам нужно мое суребро? Что ж, попробуйте взять...
Я слышу о чем вы щепчетесь за мое спиной!
Я слуга божий, следуйте моей воле!
Вам ничего нельззя доверить, жалкие язычники!
Я могу испечь торт для вас всех!
Пора заканчивать с ними, я проголодался!
Они ищут проблем? Что ж, нашли!
Этим монстрам не место на этой земле!
Я вижу как вы жаждете мое серебро...
Не похоже что вы сражаетесь по-настоящему!
Ты хоть знаешь с какой стороны держать твое оружие?
Отлично, теперь мне нужно защищать толпу болванов!
Не дайте им добраться до меня!
Похоже смерть ждет меня в этом месте!
Где мой шлем? Я потерял свой шлем!
Что ты там прячешь в руках?!
Как ты меня видашь? ты не должен!
Вам следует бежать и звать НАСТОЯЩИХ воинов.
Даже не пробуйте проводить свои языческие ритуалы.
Мне пора отдохнуть, защищайте мой сон.
Я собрал дохлых крыс вокруг. Вкусняшка!
Куда вы собрались, у нас тут дела!!!
Но мы еще не допили свой чай!
Я то знаю кто настоящий враг!
О да, неужели у тебя получилось по кому-то попасть?
Ну наконец-то! И года не прошло!
Даже на такое мозгов у тебя не хватило.
Ты пытаешься рассмешить их до смерти?
О да, теперь он глаз на тебя положил!
И как ты жив до сих пор?
Ничего мне от вас не надо!
Спасибо, но я уже видел эту корзину!
Это не очень сочетается с рыбой!
Я всего лишь убийца, пусть и в руках Господа.
Я не мог быть таким! Это не я!
Не волнуйся, я знаю что делаю.
Я сохранил немного вина для тебя.
Ну это я тут принимаю решения.
Луна сегодя не в той фазе.
Даже не пытйся подсунуть мне это.
Привлеченный странными слухами, Орден набравил всоего человека изучить ситуацию.
Я могу сражаться в любое время!
Снаряжение проверено и готово к бою!
Я могу остановить его страдания. Навечно.

Арбалетчик служит Ордену, что вбрал своей миссией не распространение веры, а уничтожение нежити и прочих противных богу существ. Выстрелы Арбалетчика способны пробить тяжелую броню. а его снадобья растворяют врагов заживо. Его сияющая броня хорошо видна в темнейшем подземелье, но он готов принять бой и развеять тьму.
Арбалетчик уничтожает врагов на расстоянии из своего арбатела. Впрочем он может принять и ближний бой, полагаясь на свою серебрянную броню.
На привале арбалетчик готовится к следующему бою и укрепляет свою веру и решимость. Его подготовка в Ордене так же предполагает оказание первой помощи и лечение ран.

I am serving the God, so obey me!
Protect me, it is pleasing to God!
My life is more valuable than your own!
You can't be relied upon, pathetic pagans!
I need to consult a gardener!
Do you want me to bake you a cake? Fine!
I see the target. Ready to shoot!
Lets finish with them, I'm hungry!
Are they looking for troubles? I'm here!
My deeds are pleasing to God!
I've achieved feats that no man could even dream of!
Like a walk in the park!
And you call this a monster?
It doesn't seem that you are fighting for real!
Were you ever taught to keep a weapon?
Now I must guard the crowd of fools! Fine!
Where is my helmet! I lost my helmet!
Can you be quiet? We have a tea party!
Sorry, but I'm in a hurry!
What is there? I don't see!
You have something on your back!
Maybe at least you have time to escape!
Ugh, I just do it by myself!
I do not see the point.
Everything is already a foregone conclusion!
Do you see me? But you can't!
We wasting time! Need to retreat!
You should run away and call a REAL fighters.
Do not even try to do your blasphemous rites.
I need to rest, guard me.
I deserve most of the trophies.
As God allowed it to happen?
I gathered dead rats around here! Delicious!
Have you decided to leave me?
I am too tired to run!
Wait! I want to play with friends!
We have not yet had tea!
You brought me up to this, traitor.
I been waiting this for whole year!
Oh really! Did you hit them?
It'd be best if we fled now!
Maybe enough of this silly pretense?
You're not very clever, are you?
You thought he would die of laughter?
How such idiot is still alive?
Let me to catch breath first!
Just leave me as I am!
Why do I need a crab shell?
I don't need anything from you!
Do you think you're the smartest?
It is better to let the tincture of flies!
Thanks, but I already saw this basket!
I do not understand this music!
It is not suitable for fish!
After all, I'm just a murderer, even in the hands of God.
It's time to prepare the bags for trophies!
Our names will go down in legends!
Don't fidget, I know what I'm doing.
You'll be as good as new!
I saved some wine for you.
Come closer, I'll give you the amulet!
It's getting dark in my eyes.
And get stabbed in the back?
Time to pray at last time.
Who is speaking? Is anybody here?
I need to clean my boots!
Want me to tell the fairy tale?
Don't make me take the knife...
The moon today is in wrong phase.
The suffering of hunger will clear me!
Thanks, but I want blackberry soup!
Attracted by strange rumours, the Temple sent one of it's followers to investigate the situation.
I'm sorry... Although no, I'm not sorry.
Crossbow - check! Bolts - check! Water - check! Dagger - check! Body Bag - check!
...rule 23: Always check whether the enemy is dead.
...rule 17: The crossbow must always be loaded.
I'll clean the wounds with silver.
Can I stop it's suffering? Forever.

The Arbalest of the Silver Temple sends the undead back to hell. His shots are capable of piercing heavy armor and potions dissolve enemies alive.His shining armor is clearly visible in the darkest dungeon, but he is ready to accept the battle and illuminate the gathering darkness.
Arbalest destroys enemies at a distance thanks to his crossbow. If necessary, he can take close combat, relying on his silver-plated armor.

Arbalest is making deadly shots and pierce the armor of enemies. The equipment of the Temple allows him to dissolve his opponents and dispel the darkness. Melee skills help to punish opponents who have come too close.
